data.Stimuli: Circuit that passes an AC signal while blocking a DC voltage.
Power supply that delivers an AC voltage.
The rotating or moving component of a magnetic circuit.
What is active region? The region of BJT operation between saturation and cut off used for linear amplification.
What is AC coupling? Circuit that passes an AC signal while blocking a DC voltage.
What is AC power supply? Power supply that delivers an AC voltage.
What is antenna, receiving? A device that converts a radiated electromagnetic wave into an electrical wave.
What is bipolar junction transistor? (BJT), A three terminal device in which emitter to collector current is controlled by base current.
What is AC/DC? Equipment that will operate on either an AC or DC power source.
What is alligator clip? Spring clip on the end of a test lead used to make a temporary connection.
What is attenuate? To reduce the amplitude of an action or signal. The opposite of amplification.
